Nightstrike:

Nightstrike had an idea "If the boy wants eat... "thought the male 
and he said "hey You... hUNGRY BOY!!! do you like eat  a delicious 
food?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Whoa!  It certainly looks like Slaughter is between a boulder 
and a
> very hard place.  Since just entering the Decepticon base, he's 
went from
> the frying pan into the fire!  I lost Skulletron once, I won't have 
him
> ressurected into Slaughter and be lost again!
> 
> IC:  Slaughter was getting desperately hungry, and had to eat soon 
or he
> would die, but he also had to avoid being blown to pieces.  Many 
projectile
> explosives were being shot at him.  Slaughter was hit by 15 rifle 
shots from
> FireStrike, and this time only a few bits of flesh flew off, but 
slime still
> flew everywhere like normal.  Slaughter got away from Stratus.  He 
forward,
> but high enough, and stuck his pincirs into the ceiling, then acted 
like
> their was sticky things on his hands, and quickly went across the 
ceiling,
> avoiding the mega missile, and the rockets, and all shots that were 
headed
> at him(sorry for missing all those shots, but I didn't want my new 
favourite
> character to die!)
> 
>     Slaughter jumped down from the ceiling, onto the floor again.
> 
>      "HUNGRY!!!" Was the only thing Slaughter seemed to be, and be 
able to
> say.
> 
>       Slaughter lunged at Shokaract, opening his jaw to try and 
take a bite
> out of Shokaract.
